citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
- One gray fox had a yellowish green discharge from both eyes. The skin around both eyes had areas that were bright
pink. The globe of each eye was also grayish blue with a cloudy appearance. According to the licensee the attending
veterinarian had been to see the foxes and had recommended moving the sheltered back into the shade. The structure
had not been moved. The attending veterinarian did not return the phone calls of USDA inspectors.
Lack of veterinary diagnosis and treatment can lead to prolonged suffering and pain. Each dealer shall establish and
maintain programs of adequate veterinary care including the use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose,
and treat diseases and injuries.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
Kristin Ray, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Direct Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
- One gray fox had a yellowish green discharge from both eyes. The skin around both eyes had areas that were bright 
pink. The globe of each eye was also grayish blue with a cloudy appearance. According to the licensee the attending 
veterinarian had been to see the foxes and had recommended moving the sheltered back into the shade. The structure 
had not been moved. The attending veterinarian did not return the phone calls of USDA inspectors. 
Lack of veterinary diagnosis and treatment can lead to prolonged suffering and pain. Each dealer shall establish and 
maintain programs of adequate veterinary care including the use of appropriate methods to prevent, control, diagnose, 
and treat diseases and injuries. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Kristin Ray, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
